item.title: I cannot remember a time without having my wife Maureen by my side. We have been together since January 2006 and experienced so much. Without her, I am really not sure where I would be. She has pushed me when I needed it and loved me through everything.
item.description: I cannot remember a time without having my wife Maureen by my side. We have been together since January 2006 and experienced so much. Without her, I am really not sure where I would be. She has pushed me when I needed it and loved me through everything. We are now proud parents to 2 beautiful children and I cannot wait to have more wonderful experiences. Thank you Maureen, I love you.

item.title: No title
Leica M240 vs M262
item.description: Getting into Leica digital photography, and having a few thousand dollars to spare. One may wonder should I buy an M240 or M262? This is the question the guys at Brooklyn Street Shooters hope to help you answer. With the used prices for M240 coming way down and hovering around the 4000 USD mark, maybe the decision is to buy a used M240. Either way watch the video and follow Brennan Mckissick @brennanphotoguy.

item.title: "There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept"- Ansel Adams
item.description: "There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept"- Ansel Adams

item.title: "Photographers deal in things which are continually vanishing and when they have vanished there is no contrivance on earth which can make them come back again." -Henri Cartier-Bresson
item.description: "Photographers deal in things which are continually vanishing and when they have vanished there is no contrivance on earth which can make them come back again." -Henri Cartier-Bresson

item.title: "Look after your mind through study, your soul through praying, your body through exercise— and then work."- St. Benedict

item.title: "If you can smell the street by looking at the photo, it's a street photograph"-Bruce Gilden
